question: Who was the founder of the Shaker movement in the United States?

answers.text: A Catholic missionary, Father El Angosto, who arrived in New York in 1784 to establish the movement
A minister of the Anglican church, Rev. Bruderhof, who started the movement in 1784 in Massachusetts and later died as a martyr
Ann Lee, or Mother Ann, who died in 1784 as a result of beatings she sustained while seeking converts and followers of the movement
Political activist and abolitionist Frederick Douglass, who after escaping slavery became a leader of the Shaker movement
